SETTINGS_DESC:
Change PepperMint+ settings. 
This setting can be accessed again via the toolbar button or settings on the extension management page.

hiderankpagead.name: Hide the Niconi ad line on the ranking page
hiderankpagead.hint: Hides the Niconi advertisement line that is sandwiched in the middle of the NicoNico Douga ranking.

hideeventbanner.name: Hide the event announcement banner on the viewing page
hideeventbanner.hint: Hides the event announcement banner displayed under the header.

hideheaderbanner.name: Hide event announcement banner in header
hideheaderbanner.hint: Hides the event announcement banner displayed on the header.

hidepopup.name: Hide advertisements about following users/supporters/premium members
hidepopup.hint: Hides the follow banner that appears when you frequently watch a specific user's videos, supporter solicitation at the bottom left of the user page, and premium membership solicitation.

hidemetadata.name: Hide metadata other than genre and posting date/time
hidemetadata.hint: Hide the number of views, likes, likes, comments, and highest rankings for intuitive video search.

featurenotavailable_newwatchpage.name: Due to the launch of the new watch page, the features in this section are currently unavailable.

enablewatchpagereplace.name: Enable PepperMint watch page
enablewatchpagereplace.hint:
Replaces the content of the watch page with the PepperMint+ watch page.
(There are some restrictions in Firefox)

pmwforcepagehls.name: Force video to load with page script
pmwforcepagehls.hint:
Always use page scripts to load videos instead of content scripts.
This is done by default in Firefox environments, but may resolve issues if you are making UA changes or if videos are not loading correctly in Chromium environments.
Generally there is no need to enable it as it may cause problems.

pmwlayouttype.name: PepperMint watch page layout
pmwlayouttype.hint: Change the layout of the PepperMint watch page.

watchpagetheme.name: Viewing page theme
watchpagetheme.hint: Change the appearance and layout of the viewing page.

playertheme.name: player theme
playertheme.hint: Change the layout and appearance of players all at once.

playerstyleoverride.name: Player theme override
playerstyleoverride.hint: Change the player's appearance. It also overrides player styles set by "player theme".

commentrow.name: Display line of comment input field
commentrow.hint: Expand the number of lines in the comment input field.

replacemarqueecontent.name: Marquee area replacement
replacemarqueecontent.hint: Replaces the content of the marquee that appears above the player video area. "Display nothing" leaves only the black background.

highlightlockedtag.name: Highlight locked tags
highlightlockedtag.hint: Makes the outline of locked tags yellow.

cleanvidowner.name: Use clean author display
cleanvidowner.hint: Display only the poster's name and hide the posted video and follow button.

shortcutassist.name: Enable shortcut assist
shortcutassist.hint: Even when the player is not focused, shortcuts for play/pause, seek forward/backward, and comment focus will be available, and a shortcut key for "いいね!" (H key) will also be added. Once ExCommander is enabled, you can open the commander using the Backspace key.

usetheaterui.name: Enable Theater UI
usetheaterui.hint: Use a theater page that displays the player panel while making the video larger.

enablenicoboxui.name: Show boxUI toggle button
enablenicoboxui.hint: A button to switch between the Nicobox style page and the normal page will be displayed at the bottom left.

skipkokenending.name: Skip Niconi Contribution's "提供" screen
skipkokenending.hint: Skip the Niconi contribution screen that appears at the end of the video.

quickvidarticle.name: Show video article button
quickvidarticle.hint: Displays a button that leads to the video article on Niconico Encyclopedia.

enablemisskeyshare.name: Enable Misskey sharing
enablemisskeyshare.hint: Displays a button to share the current video on Misskey.

hidereputation.name: Hide number of ratings
hidereputation.hint: Hides the number of ratings given to encyclopedia article responses.

liketonicoru.name: Replace high ratings with smiles
liketonicoru.hint: Change the high rating button of responses to smile.

dicfullwidth.name: open maximum width
dicfullwidth.hint: Unlock the maximum width of your content and make your articles easier to read.

dicbettereditor.name: Use dark editor
dicbettereditor.hint: Change the HTML editor when editing articles to dark and change the font to Consolas.

diccontextsearch.name: Display "ニコニコ大百科で検索" in the context menu
diccontextsearch.hint:
When you select a string and open the context menu, "ニコニコ大百科で検索" will be displayed.
Click to search NicoNico Encyclopedia for the selected text in a new tab.

alignpagewidth.name: Fix the maximum width of Niconico Home
alignpagewidth.hint: Fixed the maximum width of Niconico Home to 1024px.

fixedheaderwidth.name: Fixed header width
fixedheaderwidth.hint: The maximum width of the header content in NicoNico Douga is fixed at 1024px. It will be similar to the header before adding the sidebar.

highlightnewnotice.name: Highlight new notifications
highlightnewnotice.hint: A small red circle will be displayed in the upper left corner of new notifications, similar to the notification display in the app version of Niconico Douga.

vidtoptwocolumn.name: Display the top of the video in 2 columns
vidtoptwocolumn.hint: Displays the "Video Top" page wrapped in two columns.

darkmode.name: Dark mode/color palette
darkmode.hint:
Applies the specified palette to the page. Currently, only NicoNico Douga and some live broadcast pages are supported. 
If you enable "Follow browser settings", dark mode will not be used if the browser is in light mode.

enablevisualpatch.name: Enable visual patching
enablevisualpatch.hint:
Apply CSS to fix visual bugs such as line-height and resume playback display, and integrate rounded corner buttons. 
Also, accessibility is taken into account, making it easier to see where the focus is.

enablespredirect.name: Enable SPWatch redirect
enablespredirect.hint: When you access the mobile browser version of Nico Nico viewing page, you will be automatically redirected to the PC version of Nico Nico Douga.

enableseriesstock.name: Enable series stock
enableseriesstock.hint:
A button to stock series will be displayed at the bottom left of the series page or viewing page, and you can display the stocked series in the quick panel. 
The videos you watch in the stocked series are automatically recorded, and you can check the last video you watched and the next video. 
If you enable "Display on Niconico", a button to expand the series stock will be displayed at the bottom left of Niconico Home/Video top.

enablecustomvideotop.name: Enable custom video top
enablecustomvideotop.hint: Sort or hide the content at the top of the video according to settings.

enablenicorepotab.name: Enable Nicorepo Reader
enablenicorepotab.hint:
The "Nicorepo" tab will now be displayed on the quick panel, allowing you to check your Nicorepo. 
New arrivals are checked every 45 minutes, and if there is a new NicoRepo, you will be notified with a toolbar badge. You must be logged in to Niconico within your browser for this feature to work.

enablequicksettingstab.name: Enable quick settings tab
enablequicksettingstab.hint: The "Quick Settings" tab will now be displayed in the Quick Panel.

enableseriesstocktab.name: Enable series stock tab
enableseriesstocktab.hint: The "Series Stock" tab will now be displayed in the quick panel.

skipquickpanel.name: Skip quick panel
skipquickpanel.hint:
When you click a toolbar button, you will be redirected to the settings without displaying the quick panel. 
Suitable when not using Nicorepo reader or series stock.

NO_EPISODE_INFO: There is no episode information for the series.
NO_STOCKED_SERIES: There are no series in stock.
ADD_AVAILABLE_FROM_CURRENT_TAB: Can be added from the current tab
REMOVE_FOLDER_TITLE: Remove Folder (Series within the folder will be moved outside)
ADD_FOLDER_DESC:
Edit the folder. 
The series displayed is the list of series that can currently be added/removed. Enabling the checkbox will move the selected series to the folder.
EDIT_FOLDER_DESC:
Creates a new folder within the current series stock. 
The series displayed is a list of series that can currently be moved. Enabling the checkbox will move the selected series to the folder.
QUICKPANEL_TAB_EDIT_DESC:
You are in edit mode for the quick panel tab. 
Select the tab checkbox to show/hide the tab.
QUICKPANEL_FIRST_TIP:
Welcome to PepperMint+'s quick panel. 
Click "Open settings page" or click the title to go to the settings page. You can also edit the tab from the edit button on the top right, or edit the block display from "Edit dashboard" at the bottom.
